ЁЯСС
Accession: Rise to Power

He ascended the throne by imprisoning and killing his father, Bimbisara. Hence, he is also called Kunika and Pitri-hanta (parricide).

тЪФя╕П
Conquests and Diplomacy
  • War with Kosala: Fought against King Prasenajit and eventually married his daughter Vajira, regaining Kashi.
  • War with Vaishali: Waged a long war of 16 years against the powerful Lichchhavi confederacy. He used his minister, Vassakara, to sow discord among them.
  • Military Innovations: Used new war engines like Rathamusala and Mahashilakantaka.
Used innovative war engines
ЁЯУЬ
Rule and Administration

He strengthened the military outpost of 'Pataligrama' on the banks of the Ganges to keep an eye on Vaishali.

ЁЯПЫя╕П
Culture and Patronage

He organized the First Buddhist Council in the Sattaparni Cave of Rajagriha in 483 BCE.
